level.text: 821.1 Documentation that is required by this chapter to be served on anpplicant or a respondent shall be served at the last known address of thepplicant or respondent on file with the Department, or any representativehereof.
821.2 A document that is required by this chapter to be served on thessistant Attorney General of record in the matter shall be served at theddress on file with the Department.
821.3 Service under this chapter, unless indicated otherwise, shall beffected by:
Certified or registered mail, return receipt requested; or
Electronic mail, provided, that all parties consent in writing to servicen this manner.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 39 DCR 9052 (December 4, 1992); asmended by Final Rulemaking published at 56 DCR 8439 (October 23, 2009),ncorporating by reference text of Proposed Rulemaking published at 56 DCR 5622,638 (July 10, 2009).
